title: Sampler, 1839
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in eyelet, cross, marking cross, knot, chain, and running (pattern darning) stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Eight pattern darning crosses and one darning corner. Central cross arranged as a star, surrounded by initial and crowns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1839.
1839. Medium: silk embroidery on cotton foundation
Technique: embroidered in eyelet, cross, marking cross, knot, chain, and running (pattern darning) stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-245.
